Major_Arcs.title: The Dinosaur Trade and Its Consequences
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the events from King Guz's rescue and debt, through Alley Oop's decision to trade in his old dinosaur, the purchase of a new one, and the emotional farewell to the old dinosaur.

sub_scenes.title: Debt and Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes the initial rescue of King Guz, the subsequent confrontation about the unpaid debt, and the start of Alley Oop's journey with Bronto Soreness, setting up the need for a new dinosaur.

narrative_arcs.title: Bronto Soreness Collides with a Tree

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Dealership and Purchase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the suggestion of trading in the dinosaur, the visit to Honest Zog's dealership, the test drive offer, and the eventual purchase of a new, smaller dinosaur.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership
Test Drive Offer at the Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Farewell and New Beginnings
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the emotional farewell to the old dinosaur, the initial instructions for the new dinosaur, and the final placement of the old dinosaur back at the dealership.

narrative_arcs.title: Old Dinosaur Marked Down for Sale

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Mishaps and Misunderstandings
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores various comedic and often misogynistic perspectives on romance and relationships, from dinosaur dealership flirtations to jealous outbursts and romantic advice, culminating in physical comedy.

sub_scenes.title: New Dinosaur and Dinny's Scolding
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features the initial experiences with the new dinosaur, including a minor mishap and Dinny's critical reaction to Alley Oop's riding skills.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Salesman's Pitch and Dissatisfied Customer

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Dinosaur Defense and Impending Charge
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Dinny's angry outburst and his protective reaction towards his dinosaur, leading to a potentially aggressive action directed at cave children.

sub_scenes.title: Ooola's Rejection and Breakup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the tense interaction between Alley Oop and Ooola, starting with a fishing invitation, escalating to accusations and a breakup, and ending with a violent act.

sub_scenes.title: Misogynistic Fishing Trip
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features a fishing trip where misogynistic views are expressed and arguments arise, highlighting stereotypical gender-based complaints.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Silence and Misogynistic Retort

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Competition and Flirtation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on romantic rivalry and attempts to win Oola's affection, showcasing arguments, doubt, and ultimately successful flirtation.

narrative_arcs.title: Surprise Meeting and Talk of Female Attention
Departure and Continued Doubt about Oola

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy and Misunderstanding Fight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays a violent confrontation based on jealousy and a subsequent revelation of a romantic misunderstanding.

sub_scenes.title: Romance Lessons and Rhyme
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on a humorous attempt to understand and learn about romance, involving definitions, analogies, and practical advice, ending with a reflection on rhyming.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Gifts and Competition Escalation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts romantic gift-giving and the escalating competition between cavemen to impress cavewomen, involving flowers, petunias, and leafy branches, leading to comedic and confrontational situations.

sub_scenes.title: Various Romantic Troubles
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene encompasses various romantic conflicts and misunderstandings, including jealousy, accusations of cowardice and cannibalism (misunderstood), and humorous clarifications.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Tension and Loss of Control

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity and Romantic Reformation Attempts
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene deals with themes of infidelity, punishment, guilt, and attempts at romantic reformation, showcasing a range of reactions to romantic transgressions.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twitch Dance Craze and Its Absurd Consequences
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes dance crazes through 'the twitch,' exploring its social pressures, physical dangers, and unexpected societal impacts, culminating in a hospital scene filled with 'twitch' related injuries.

sub_scenes.title: Twist Injuries and Social Pressure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the dance craze 'the twitch' and its immediate consequences: physical injuries and social pressure to participate.

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Dance Lesson and Humiliation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on a comedic dance lesson for 'the twitch', filled with mishaps and culminating in public humiliation due to perceived incompetence.

narrative_arcs.title: Ants in the Pants Prank and Humiliation

sub_scenes.title: The Absurd Danger of Watching the Twitch
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the highly absurd and comedic consequence of 'the twitch': it's dangerous to even watch, leading to mass hospitalizations and highlighting the ridiculousness of the craze.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel for Research and Bullfighting
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc combines time travel for historical research with a comedic bullfighting subplot, showcasing the scientist's quest for knowledge and the accidental time travelers' unexpected adventures in ancient Spain.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel Research and Romantic Past
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the time travel plotline, starting with researchers discussing historical research challenges and deciding to use a time machine, leading to a glimpse of Alley and Oola in the past.

narrative_arcs.title: Research Problem and Time Travel Solution

sub_scenes.title: 20th Century Interruption and Return to Spain
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays the arrival of Alley and Oola in the 20th century, their interaction with Wonmug regarding a Spain assignment, and their immediate return to ancient Spain due to Alley's frustration.

narrative_arcs.title: Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spain Assignment
Justification for Interruption and Thesis Importance
Reassurance and Return to Ancient Spain
Back in Ancient Spain and Alley's Comment

sub_scenes.title: Buster's Disruptive Serenade and Bullfight Disaster
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a comedic subplot in ancient Spain involving Buster's disruptive serenade, his confrontation with the matador, and the ensuing bullfight chaos.

narrative_arcs.title: The Racket and the Dame on the Balcony
The Girlfriend's Fury and Matador's Identity
Don Jose's Unconsciousness and the Delayed Bullfight
Desperate Measures and a Novelty Act
Audience Critique of the Novelty Matador

sub_scenes.title: Return to the 20th Century and Romantic Accusations
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene returns to the 20th century, depicting the woman's impatience for 'oop's return, a brief romantic interlude, and finally a jealous confrontation with the scientist upon his return.

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and Royal Absurdities
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes the concept of kingship and authority through the 'King for a Day' scenario, showcasing the burdens, manipulations, and absurdities of temporary power and royal life.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to King for a Day
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the concept of 'King for a Day' and the initial setup with the crowned man being carried, highlighting the contrast between perceived royalty and actual labor.

narrative_arcs.title: Dialogue on the Burden of Kingship

sub_scenes.title: The New King's Humiliation and the Old King's Satisfaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the immediate aftermath of the new king's appointment: his public humiliation and the previous king's manipulative satisfaction with the outcome.

narrative_arcs.title: New King's Proclamation and Former King's Command
Mob's Rejection and Former King's Justification
New King's Isolation and Cave Improvement

Major_Arcs.title: Domestic Disputes and Royal Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores comedic domestic squabbles and various royal conflicts, ranging from arguments over cleanliness and food to disputes about cheating, money, and clam ownership, all resolved in absurd and humorous ways.

sub_scenes.title: Guz and the Ulcer Pills Bon-Bons
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene revolves around a domestic dispute between Guz and the Queen over 'bon-bons' which turn out to be ulcer pills and Guz's dirty feet, highlighting humorous marital squabbles.

narrative_arcs.title: Bon-Bons Revealed as Ulcer Pills and Queen's Disgust
True Cause of Queen's Anger: Filthy Feet

sub_scenes.title: Royal Rumpus and Clam Dispute Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts various royal conflicts, including accusations of cheating at 'rum-pus', a fight over money, and a clam dispute, all leading to the Wise Man's unconventional resolution by confiscating the clams.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight Over Money and Royal Observation
Summoning the Wise Man for Resolution
Wise Man Consulted on the Argument

sub_scenes.title: Recurring Fights and Royal Dinner
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases recurring issues in the royal setting, including ongoing fights and financial accusations, contrasted with the anticipation and dietary restrictions surrounding the royal dinosaur dinner.

sub_scenes.title: Various Apologies and Propositions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents a series of brief, disconnected scenarios including apologies, a return to ordinary life, and a ruler proposition, showcasing varied interactions and transitions.

narrative_arcs.title: Pal's Profound Apology and Food Offering

sub_scenes.title: Fortune Telling and Forced Shaving
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene combines fortune telling with a bizarre 'barberous act' of forced shaving, connecting seemingly unrelated events through the promise of a 'bearded stranger' and its unexpected, literal interpretation.

narrative_arcs.title: Moo Tonsorial Parlor and Forced Shaving

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Experiment and Unexpected Roman Visitor
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the narrative with a return to the time travel theme, depicting a scientist's time machine experiment that unexpectedly brings a Roman soldier to the present, ending on a cliffhanger and comedic absurdity.
